author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Implement the alpaka-based accelerator framework for CMSSW.

There are two open issues, that could be addressed by further developments here or in a follow-up PR:
  - the CPU workflow is inefficient with an extra memory copy;
  - the use of beginStream() needs to be understood and removed.

#### PR validation:

The unit tests pass and the test modules seem to behave as expected.
title: Implement the alpaka-based accelerator framework for CMSSW
